text: The Bangladesh national under-23 cricket team in March 2004 played a first- class match against Zimbabwe A at the Fatullah Osmani Stadium, losing to Zimbabwe by 223 runs. The team has since played four matches in 2013, two of them having List A status. ==See also== * Bangladesh A cricket team * Bangladesh national under-19 cricket team * List of Bangladesh under-23 international cricketers ==References== A Category:Under-23 cricket teams Category:National sports teams of Bangladesh
title: Bangladesh national under-23 cricket team
